src_original: saddharmaparigrahe /  evaṃ mahāviṣayo bhagavan saddharmaparigrahêti //  punar atrâivâha /
tgt_original: 善哉勝鬘！ 如汝所說，攝受正法大威德力。

src_original: syād yathâpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyâlpo 'pi  vedhanīyo bhavati vādhākaraś ca /
tgt_original: 如大力士微觸末摩，生大苦痛更增重病。

src_original: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho-  vedhanīyo bhavati śokâvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 如是勝鬘！ 假令少分攝受正法，令魔波旬痛切愁惱悲號歎息，亦復如是。

src_original: nâhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya  pāpīyasâivaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokâvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca /  yathâyam alpo 'pi  [ Bendall ed p43 ---> ]  saddharmaparigrahêti //
tgt_original: 勝鬘！ 我常不見餘一善法令魔愁惱，猶如少分攝受正法。 勝鬘！

src_original: syād yathâpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān  kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate côccatvena
tgt_original: 勝鬘！ 又如須彌山王高廣嚴麗蔽於眾山。
